page.title: 11INTERVEIW cont.
page.content: When asked if he would have liked to have had a different occupation or to have lived somewhere else he was adamant that he would not have been happier living elsewhere nor in any other form of employment. He enjoys living in Llanychaer and his favourite leisure time occupation is reading historical books and carpentry. He proudly showed us a gold pocket watch that had been presented to him for full attendance at Barham Voluntary School.During his childhood, it was rare for a child to attend school regularly.He walked 8 miles daily,as many other children did, but there were many illnesses and children would have long absences from school.
